title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 606.9 - Assignment of counsel in Surrogate's Court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 606.9 - Assignment of counsel in Surrogate's Court

State Regulations

Counsel to be assigned pursuant to

Surrogate's Court Procedure Act, section 407 shall be selected from such panels
as have been established in the First Judicial Department for use in the Family

Court in conformity with article 18-B of the County Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
606.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
